com.sonyericsson.capuchin
Class FlashCanvas

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
          com.sonyericsson.capuchin.FlashCanvas

public class FlashCanvas
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas

This class represents a Canvas associated with a FlashImage.

The Canvas is used for rendering frames of the Flash content in the paint() method and it provides information about the time delay until the next frame rendering.

This class also forwards automatically key and pointer events to Flash.

This class can be extended and is used directly with FlashPlayer.createFlashPlayer(FlashImage, FlashCanvas).

See FlashPlayer for code example when using and extending this class

Method Detail

getDelay

public int getDelay()
Returns the delay in milliseconds until the next rendering of a Flash frame. This value was specified in the Flash content when it was created.

Returns:
the time in milliseconds until next rendering cycle.
